topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c259d6368727819030000#post_545c259d6368727819030000
Homestuck. It feels like it wants to jump RIGHT into world building. But you can't do that. You gotta ease the audience into the world. Like Nash said "It's like using chloroform to get us into the creepy van rather than candy."
